name: Bienvenue chez les Ch'tis
overview: Welcome to the Ch'tis on Wii takes up the universe of Dany Boon's hit film. Find the emblematic places and characters of the feature film and face many wacky challenges. Put your Ch'ti culture to work, race your bike, play the carillon, spread maroilles cheese as quickly as possible, learn the patois and support RC Lens to the rhythm.
